DOC.brief_summary: The primary outcome procedure : 1 . The cleanliness prep measure Ottawa Scale ( attachment ) . Secondary outcome : 1 . Patient satisfaction prep measure 5 point Likert scale ( attachment b ) ; 2 . Procedure time ; 3 . The number size polyp detect examination .
DOC.brief_title: Split Dose Golytely With Amitiza Pretreatment Versus Split Dose Golytely Plus Placebo Outpatient Colonoscopy
DOC.criteria: Adult patient refer clinic Average Increased Risk screen Colorectal Cancer Ages 18 year age old Chronic kidney disease Previous diagnosis congestive heart failure History bowel obstruction History solid organ transplant Pregnancy
